list.name: Changes
list.comment:
Implement PSR-4 autoloading and expand testing suite
The changes introduce PSR-4 autoloading for main library and development files in composer.json. The core SDK files have been moved to the new src/SDK directory to better suit the new autoloading scheme. In addition, several test cases for the AuthSDK, Authorize, and TemporaryCredentials classes have been added to ensure the proper functioning and behavior of the SDK. The 'phpunit/phpunit' package was also added to the development dependencies to facilitate the running of these tests.

task.summary:
Add Fluffici authentication SDK
The commit introduces the Fluffici authentication SDK which allows user authorization via OAuth. A helper class Authorize SDK was also created to handle requesting authentication and constructing URLs with specific query parameters. An AuthSDK class, to retrieve and manage client details, and a TemporaryCredentials class, to hold the authentication result and grant type, have also been added. Lastly, the required dependencies in the composer.json file and a brief README were added to explain the SDK usage and its importance.

Implement PSR-4 autoloading and expand testing suite
The changes introduce PSR-4 autoloading for main library and development files in composer.json. The core SDK files have been moved to the new src/SDK directory to better suit the new autoloading scheme. In addition, several test cases for the AuthSDK, Authorize, and TemporaryCredentials classes have been added to ensure the proper functioning and behavior of the SDK. The 'phpunit/phpunit' package was also added to the development dependencies to facilitate the running of these tests.
